mapper.select: SELECT SCHEDULE_TYPE, SCHEDULE_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME, TITLE FROM T_MEMBER_SCHEDULE WHERE MEMBER_SEQ = #{memberSeq} ORDER BY SCHEDULE_DATE DESC, START_TIME ASC, END_TIME ASC
SELECT SECHEDULE_SEQ, MEMBER_SEQ, SCHEDULE_TYPE, SCHEDULE_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME, TITLE FROM T_MEMBER_SCHEDULE WHERE SECHEDULE_SEQ = #{scheduleSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_MEMBER_SCHEDULE ( MEMBER_SEQ, SCHEDULE_TYPE, SCHEDULE_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME, TITLE, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{member_seq}, #{schedule_type}, #{schedule_date}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{title}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_MEMBER_SCHEDULE SET SCHEDULE_TYPE = #{schedule_type}, SCHEDULE_DATE = #{schedule_date}, START_TIME = #{start_time}, END_TIME = #{end_time}, TITLE = #{title} WHERE SCHEDULE_SEQ = #{scheduleSeq}
